## 转换成curd setting API 使用

```
POST /createpage

    - endpoint: 必填
    - originApi: 必填
    - createPageApi: 必填
    - addFieldApi: 必填
    - token: 可选

//提交数据格式

{
    "endpoint": "https://api.xiaojiuban.smallsaas.cn",
    "originApi": "/api/crud/product/productCategoryies/20",
    "createPageApi": "/api/crud/lowMainPage/lowMainPages",
    "addFieldApi": "/api/crud/lowFields/lowFieldses",
    "token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..hF8nSjFCiC7KPUNM5L6sekixB3XzGVKWa3wDdQ_irAilkC-APBV2qn5z-qJWUzty_vtM8c_3_tqEWmmC-S0XNA"
}

```
